MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA16 postcode area of Knutsford, affecting properties in London Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.16AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.29AM on 25th October 2020.
